description: The original notice of the procurement initiative had to be postponed due to their requirements. Now, they are seeking to procure Vector Signal Generators.
duration_in_months: With reference to the previous Tweet which only revealed the title of the procurement , this is the first time the public has any access to the actual procurement details.

full_summary:
## Tender Notice: Vector Signal Generator

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01012918  
**Solicitation Number:** CRC20221122  
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-08  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-22T14:00:00

### Overview
The Department of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) intends to acquire [vector signal generator(s)] from a Supply Arrangement (SA) holder. The solicitation is issued through the Buy and Sell GC (Goods and Services) portal under a Request for Proposal (RFP) process.

### Description of Goods/Services
ISED requires a Vector Signal Generator, with the following specifications:
- Model: SMW200A
- Unit: Base Unit
- Order Number: 1412.0000.02
- SMW-B1067 Frequency Range: 100 kHz to 6.7 GHz
- Order Number: 1428.8106.02
- SMW-B92 Wideband Baseband Main Module, 2I/Q Paths to RF
- Order Number: 1414.6129.02
- SMW-B93 Solid-State Drive (SSD)

### Eligible Suppliers
Prequalified Suppliers have been invited to participate in the tender process. Only Suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) with Public Works and Government Services Canada for the specific items outlined above are eligible to submit a proposal.

### Tender Process
The RFP process is selective, with firms already holding a valid SA issued under the bid solicitation CRC20221122. Bids may only be submitted by Suppliers that meet the above-mentioned criteria. ISED intends to make a recommendation for contract award to the Supplier holding the SA with the lowest evaluated price.

### Contract Details
The requested delivery date for all goods is on or before March 31st, 2023. All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature must be submitted to Samantha Amadio, Contracting Officer, at samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca. Inquiries must be made in writing and received no less than five (5) working days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time to respond.

**Contracting Information**
- Name: Industry Canada
- Address: (private address details)

**Contact Information**
- Name: Samantha Amadio
- Email: samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 542-2505
- Fax: 

###
